information: The company DZ FLORISTIK GMBH, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 2001, which operates in the Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry industry. It also operates in the Nurseries, Furnishings - accessories and decorative objects, Stationery, and Handicraft industries. It is based in Bottrop, Germany.
